name: Africa
description: Africa offers world-class surf spots, particularly in South Africa and Morocco, with consistent waves and some of the best right-hand point breaks in the world.

name: Asia
description: Asia is home to famous surf destinations like Bali in Indonesia and the tropical waves of the Philippines and Sri Lanka, attracting surfers year-round.

name: Europe
description: Europe has diverse surfing opportunities, from Portugal's giant waves in Nazar√© to France's famous beach breaks and consistent swells along the Atlantic coast.

name: North America
description: North America offers a wide variety of surf spots, from California's consistent west coast breaks to Hawaii's legendary waves like Pipeline.

name: Oceania
description: Home to world-class surf spots like Teahupo'o, Cloudbreak, and Bells Beach, this region offers diverse waves across its stunning islands and coastlines.

name: South America
description: South America provides epic surf destinations, particularly in Brazil, Chile, and Peru, with long left-hand waves and reliable swells year-round.
